title: Challenging years
creator_credit: David E. Barrow, Peter Fletcher, Stanley Hawes, Motion Picture Associates and New South Wales Film Corporation
brief_description: Shows how some elderly men and women have planned for retirement. Illustrates, with dramatic vignettes, the positive and rewarding aspects of this period of life, and warns of the pitfalls to be avoided.
creator_credit_for_label: David E. Barrow, Peter Fletcher, Stanley Hawes, Motion Picture Associates and New South Wales Film Corporation
